EVERY LETER THAT FOLLOWS A CONSONANT IS VOCALIC
EVERY VOWEL IS UNIQUE AND FINAL
NO CONSONANT IS ADJACENT TO A GLIDE
SOME GLIDE THAT LETTER FOUR FOLLOWS IS UNVOICED AND CAPITALIZED OR IS FINAL
THE LETTER THAT IMMEDIATELY PRECEDES LETTER FOUR IS LETTER THREE
AT LEAST ONE GLIDE IS REPEATED
EVERY VOWEL THAT LETTER ONE PRECEDES PRECEDES A UNVOICED CENTERED EVEN GLIDE
EVERY CONSONANT THAT LETTER TWO PRECEDES IS VOICED OR UNVOICED AND NO K IS CONSONANTAL AND CAPITAL
SOME FRICATIVES PRECEDE LETTER TWO OR FOLLOW LETTER FOUR AND ARE ADJACENT TO LETTER THREE
NO CAPITAL LETTER FOLLOWS A FRICATIVE OR MORE THAN ONE VOWEL AND AT LEAST ONE GLIDE
ONLY LETTER TWO IS UNIQUE AND IS VOICED
THERE IS EXACTLY ONE LETTER THAT PRECEDES A D
THE LETTER THAT PRECEDES LETTER FIVE IS A VOWEL
NO VOWEL IS VOICED AND IS FINAL
THE LETTER THAT IMMEDIATELY PRECEDES LETTER FOUR IS LETTER THREE
EVERY U THAT LETTER THREE IS ADJACENT TO IS CAPITALIZED AND FINAL
ALL VOWELS ARE NOT VOICED AND THERE IS NO U THAT FOLLOWS SOME GLIDES
THE PENULTIMATE LETTER IS NOT A VOWEL
EVERY VOCALIC EVEN LETTER THAT PRECEDES SOME VOWEL IS A I AND IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWS A GLIDE
NO CONSONANT IS ADJACENT TO A GLIDE
ALL MIRRORED LETTERS ARE NOT CAPITALIZED
THERE ARE SOME GLIDES THAT ARE CENTERED
SOME VOWELS PRECEDE A UNIQUE CONSONANT OR MORE THAN ONE VOCALIC EVEN LETTER AND ARE CAPITALIZED
